element.name: 3.8 Quality Criteria for Work Products and Requirements

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Handbook for the CPRE Foundation Level according to the IREB Standard v.1.10 / 3.8 Quality Criteria for Work Products and Requirements>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement shall describe true stakeholder needs.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement shall describe agreed stakeholder needs.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should contribute to the achievement of at least one stakeholder goal or need.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be interpretable the same way by everybody involved.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should miss no parts that are necessary for understanding.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement shall be fully understandable by the target audience.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement shall be indisputably checkable for its fulfillment by an implemented system, so that stakeholders or customers can decide whether or not a requirement is fulfilled by the implemented system.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should not contradict another requirement.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be documented only once.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should not overlap with another requirement.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirements specification should contain all relevant requirements (functionalrequirements, quality requirements, and constraints) that are known at this point in time.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirements specification should contain all relevant requirements (functionalrequirements, quality requirements, and constraints) that are that are related to this specification.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirements specification should be set up in such a way that it can be modified without degrading its quality.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be traceable back to their origins.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be traceable forward to their implementation (in design, code, and test).

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be traceable to other requirements they depend on.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: If there are mandatory structuring or formatting instructions, a requirement should conform to them.

element.name: 7.2.4.1 Characteristics of Requirements and Designs Quality

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Handbook for the CPRE Foundation Level according to the IREB Standard v.1.10 / 3.8 Quality Criteria for Work Products and Requirements>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be self-contained.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be capable of being understood independently of other requirements or designs.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be complete enough to guide further work.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The level of completeness required shall differ based on perspective or methodology, as well as the point in the life cycle where the requirement is being examined or represented.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be at the appropriate level of detail for work to continue.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be aligned with the identified needs of the stakeholders.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should not conflict with other requirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should contains no extraneous content.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should contains no unnecessary content.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be reasonably feasible and possible within the agreed-upon risk, schedule, and budget.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be considered feasible enough to investigate further through experiments or prototypes.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be clearly stated in such a way to make it clear whether a solution does or does not meet the associated need.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be able to verify that the requirement or design has been fulfilled.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: Acceptable levels of verifying fulfillment depend on the level of abstraction of the requirement or design.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be ranked, grouped, or negotiated in terms of importance and value against all other requirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should be represented using common terminology of the audience.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to achieve the objectives within the given contraints in order to ensure the organizations success.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the scope ranges in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to define the scope of the mission in order to stay within the scope ranges.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the quality ranges in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the available resources in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to estimate the resources needed for development in order to predict if the mission is able to stay within the available resources.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to quantify the system requirements, in order to be able to estimate the resources needed for their implementation.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the given timeline in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to estimate the time needed for development in order to predict if the mission is able stay within the given timeline.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to quantify the system requirements, in order to be able to estimate the time needed for their implementation.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the benefit ranges in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to complete the mission within the acceptable risks in order to stay within the given contraints.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A stakeholder need shall be reviewed by the stakeholder and the supplier in order to receive feedback or acceptance.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A stakeholder need shall be reviewed by the stakeholder and the supplier in order to receive feedback or acceptance.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A stakeholder need should not make

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process purpose>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish the integrity of all work products of a process or project.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall maintain the integrity of all work products of a process or project.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall make all work products of a process or project available to affected parties.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 1>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall develop a strategy for configuration management.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 2>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall identify all configuration items generated by a process or project according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall define all configuration items generated by a process or project according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall baseline all configuration items generated by a process or project according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 3>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall control modifications of the configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall control releases of the configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 4>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall make modifications available to affected parties.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall make releases available to affected parties.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 5>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall record the status of configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall record the status of modification.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall report the status of configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall report the status of modification.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 6>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the completeness of the baselines.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the consistency of the baselines.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Process outcome 7>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall control the storage of the configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 1>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall develop a configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include responsibilities.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include tools.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include repositories.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include criteria for configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include naming conventions.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include access rights.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include criteria for baselines;

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include a merge strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include a branch strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy shall include the revision history approach for configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management strategy should typically supports the handling of product/software variants which may be caused by different sets of application parameters or by other causes.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The branch management strategy should specify in which cases branching is permissible.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The branch management strategy should specify whether authorization is required.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The branch management strategy should specify how branches are merged.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The branch management strategy should specify which activities are required to verify that all changes have been consistently integrated without damage to other changes or to the original software.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 2>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall identify configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall identify configuration items according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall document configuration items according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process should apply configuration control for the products that are delivered to the customer, designated internal work products, acquired products, tools and other configuration items that are used in creating and describing these work products.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 3>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish a configuration management system.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish a configuration management system according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 4>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish branch management according to the configuration management strategy for parallel developments that use the same base.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 5>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall control modifications.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall control releases.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish mechanisms for the control of the configurations items according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to control modifications using these mechanisms.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: I want to control releases using these mechanisms.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 6>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish baselines for internal purposes according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall establish baselines for external delivery according to the configuration management strategy.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall refer to the product release process SPL.2 for baseline issues.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 7>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall report configuration status.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall record status of configuration items to support project management and other relevant processes.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall report status of configuration items to support project management and other relevant processes.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 8>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall verify the information about configured items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall verify that the information about configured items is complete.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall verify that the information about configured items' baselines is complete.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the consistency of baselines.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process should implement this as baseline audits.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process should implement this as configuration management audits.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: <See Automotive Spice 3.1 / Process Reference Model / SUP.8 Configuration Management / Base practice 9>

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall manage the storage of configuration items.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall manage the storage of baselines.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the integrity of configuration items through appropriate scheduling and resourcing of storage, archiving (long term storage) and backup of the used CM systems.equirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the integrity of baselines through appropriate scheduling and resourcing of storage, archiving (long term storage) and backup of the used CM systems.equirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the availability of configuration items through appropriate scheduling and resourcing of storage, archiving (long term storage) and backup of the used CM systems.equirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure the availability of baselines through appropriate scheduling and resourcing of storage, archiving (long term storage) and backup of the used CM systems.equirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall extend storage beyond guaranteed lifetime of available storage media.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall extend archiving beyond guaranteed lifetime of available storage media.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall include relevant, affected configuration items as referenced in note 2 and note 3.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The configuration management process shall ensure availability as specified by contract requirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A requirement should describe only a single property or function of a single system element.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be independent meaning it is describe without reference to other requirements, in order to prevent inconsistencies between requirements and enhance understanding of the requirement.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be detailed enough, in order to enable effective development activities.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be consistent with all other requirements, to avoid competing development activities and/or system disruption.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be specific to only the system, to avoid unfeasible development efforts.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be feasible with the available resources and constraints, to ensure sustainable and effective development.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be prioritized according to their importance, to support the expected order of releases and limit dependency risks.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be unambiguous, to prevent differing interpretations between stakeholder and development team.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be comprehensible, to support a common understanding of the requirement between stakeholder and development team.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be testable, to support validation and verification activities.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be unique, to avoid duplicate planning of development efforts and inconsistencies between requirements.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be identifiable, to support traceability and improve clear communication.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be traceable to its origin, to support change management and stakeholder acceptance.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be mapped to elements in the system, to support planning of development and effective use of resources.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement may be conforming with defined formats to support understanding between stakeholder and development team.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be derived from stakeholder input, to avoid extraneous development efforts.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be analyzed by the development team, to understand its impact on the system and development.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be reviewed by the stakeholder and the development team, to ensure informed agreement.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement shall be agreed upon by the stakeholder and the development team, to ensure accountability and support the establishment of baselines.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement should be tangible

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The requirement may use its own data type.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: A system element shall have a status within the element lifecycle in order to ??? account for maturity???

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The element lifecycle shall contain an Open status, in order to indicate that no work has been done yet.

profile.name: Requirement
profile.text: The element lifecycle may contain a Draft status, in order to indicate the system element is not
